objective: Surface financiers, insurers, and risk vectors (credit, liquidity, geopolitical) that affect NVIDIA supply or partners.
prompt: Return JSON capturing capital providers, underwriting partners, and risk tags tied to NVIDIA partners. Score each risk by confidence, cite filings or rating agencies, and embed artifact metadata (artifactIdPrefix + timestamp). StreamId must be financing-risk. Highlight exposures that could trigger mitigation actions (e.g., credit downgrades, sanctions).

inputs.name: coverage
inputs.description: Type of capital or risk (credit line, insurance, FX).

inputs.name: counterparty
inputs.description: Partner or supplier impacted by financing/risk events.

entities.label: Company
entities.description: Supplier, partner, or financier in the risk story.

relationships.description: Company backed by a financier or insurer.

citations.notes: Weight official filings and underwriting announcements over anonymous commentary.

scoringHeuristics.notes: Use numeric data when available (downgrade rating, insured amount).

scoringHeuristics.target: Cite at least two source types
scoringHeuristics.notes: Mix regulatory filings with press statements.
